"A.D.2028/4/23/17:00": "Hitsugi! Aru! And... Mother!"
"Jeez, you actually did it! My stupid little sister!"
"Big brother!"
"You made it back, Aru! Truly my little brother, good job!"
"Kohri!"
"W-What?! No \"big sis\" for me? But this warm hug makes up for it."
"Welcome back, Aru. I'm glad you've returned safely."
"...Hitsugi Yasaka."
"Hm?"
"Thank you. I..."
"Thank you for your hard work, Mother. This is the end of your role."
"Mother!"
"Ardem?! How are you here?!"
"Ophiel..."
"My apologies, Mother. But this is necessary for the evolution of mankind."
"Mother. I am grateful to you. Thanks to the Ether you produced, the Earth is about to move on to its next stage."
"And now, you will be absorbed by me, and become the foundation of a paradigm shift, becoming one with your beloved Earth."
"Won't that be nice, Mother?"
"Mother!"
"Thank you, Ms. Hitsugi. Enga, Kohri too... and <%me>."
"Without your cooperation, I don't think we would have made it through this. Sincerely, thank you."
"Why would you do this?"
"Huh...? To protect the Earth, of course."
"You all were aware that Mother posed a grave threat to Earth, yes?"
"We had no choice but to kill her. I think that's the natural decision for someone devoted to guiding Earth, yes?"
"Even so... Mother was already..."
"Not just that, Ardem. Who is that guy you brought with you? Why are you with him?"
"No need to conccern yourselves about it, Enga Yasaka, Kohri Washinomiya. I'm Mother Cluster's Apostle of Water, and a member of Earth Guide. That's all."
"So you were a spy for Earth Guide...? But you really messed up a lot of things for us, you know."

"I did what was necessary to fufill our goals.
That's all there is to it."
"Your goals, you say?"
"Enga, do you remember what I said when I invited you to join Earth Guide?"
"The Earth of today is stagnant."
"With no new innovations, no evolution... It's just a world of consumption."
"We must lead the Earth. To a further evolution... To a new world restructuring."
"\"Earth Guide\". Those who will guide the Earth. If we don't accomplish this, there is no future for this planet."
"You are a chosen one, Enga. I need you. I need you to lend me your strength."
"I thought that was just a fancy speech, but... looking at your face, you're really serious."
"You've killed Mother and acquired her power... Ardem, do you seriously think that's all it takes to change the world?"
"Of course I can change it. I've changed it over and over again over these tens of thousands of years."
"Tens of thousands of years...? Changed it, countless times...?"
"-English Title-"
"タイトル"
